com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary
Class FourPointsPositionChecker

java.lang.Object
  com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary.PointsPositionChecker
      com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary.FourPointsPositionChecker

public class FourPointsPositionChecker
extends PointsPositionChecker

Class description:
Class for checking whether certain points' positions of four points correspond to specified NDG condition

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

checkPositions

public boolean checkPositions(java.util.Vector<Point> pointList)
Method that checks if some position of four given points can generate polynomial for attached NDG condition. If can, text of this NDG condition is populated with appropriate readable form that describes specific position of these four points that generates this NDG condition. The text actually corresponds to the negation of attached NDG condition.

Specified by:
checkPositions in class PointsPositionChecker
Parameters:
pointList - List with four points
Returns:
True if some position generates attached NDG condition, false otherwise
See Also:
PointsPositionChecker.checkPositions(java.util.Vector)
